_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
an8.30:12.4^where_before_or_around_this_: the land of the Bhaggas on Crocodile Hill in the deer park at Bhesakaḷā's Wood
the land of the Magadhans near Kallavāḷaputta Village
the land of the Cetīs in the Eastern Bamboo Park
an8.30:23.1^where_before_or_around_this_: Eastern Bamboo Park in the land of the Cetīs
Bhesakaḷā's Wood in the land of the Bhaggas
an8.30^where: the land of the Bhaggas on Crocodile Hill, in the deer park at Bhesakaḷā's Wood and the land of the Cetīs in the Eastern Bamboo Park.
